### Command (Merge)
The Merge command is a command ther perfoms the join data in the tradotional ways to join data (Left, Inner, Right, Full), just taking this approach from the SQL commands. Obiously this is not hard like SQL is easier, some examples [Here](https://www.shanelynn.ie/merge-join-dataframes-python-pandas-index-1/).
source.b86b832e:
# Preprocessing Data

Hi Beitlab Friends, here you can find a Python Notebook where i solve the Dataset Union Problem that AWS Quicksight couldn´t solve in our dataton. You can follow this steps in AWS Sagemaker or other Jupyter Notebook Environment. Just remember route the right address of the files **.csv**.
I hope you can enjoy it as i enjoy coding it.

## Index
1. Importing needed libraries
2. Create the merge function
3. Saving the final csv

### 1. Importing needed libraries
Here we work with Pandas, a Python based library that helps us with the hard work with data. Yes, that type of work like generate grouping or aggregations or simply generate Descriptive Statistics with few commands.
